done.text:
Successfully completed the YouTube video sharing workflow!

**Video Details:**
- Title: SpaceX Makes History Catching Rocket on Landing
- Channel: Bloomberg Technology
- Views: 1.3M views
- Published: 1 year ago
- Video Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYUr-5PYA7s

**Workflow Completed:**
1. ‚úÖ Navigated to YouTube homepage
2. ‚úÖ Searched for SpaceX videos
3. ‚úÖ Selected the SpaceX rocket catching video
4. ‚úÖ Opened the Share modal
5. ‚úÖ Copied the video link to clipboard

The video link has been successfully copied and is ready to be shared. The video showcases SpaceX's historic achievement of catching the Super Heavy booster rocket back on the launch pad using mechanical arms.
